post.description: Create a new agent with the specified configuration.

get.description: Get an agent by its ID

delete.description: Delete an agent by its ID

post.description: Migrate an agent to a new versioned agent template. This will only work for "classic" and non-multiagent agent templates.

preserve_tool_variables.description: If true, preserves the existing agent's tool environment variables instead of using the template's variables

get.description: Get the variables associated with an agent

post.description: Creates an Agent or multiple Agents from a template

parameters.name: template_version
parameters.description: The template version, formatted as {template-name}:{version-number} or {template-name}:latest

tags.description: The tags to assign to the agent

agent_name.description: The name of the agent, optional otherwise a random one will be assigned

initial_message_sequence.description: Set an initial sequence of messages, if not provided, the agent will start with the default message sequence, if an empty array is provided, the agent will start with no messages

memory_variables.description: The memory variables to assign to the agent

tool_variables.description: The tool variables to assign to the agent

identity_ids.description: The identity ids to assign to the agent

deployment_id.description: The deployment ID of the created agents, group and blocks, can be used to identify from a specific invokation

parameters.name: exact
parameters.description: Whether to search for an exact name match

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Specify the version you want to return, otherwise will return the latest version

name.description: The exact name of the template

latest_version.description: The latest version of the template

template_deployment_slug.description: The full name of the template, including version and project slug

updated_at.description: When the template was last updated

post.description: Saves the current version of the template as a new version

parameters.name: template_name
parameters.description: The template version, formatted as {template-name}, any version appended will be ignored

preserve_environment_variables_on_migrat.description: If true, the environment variables will be preserved in the template version when migrating agents

preserve_core_memories_on_migration.description: If true, the core memories will be preserved in the template version when migrating agents

migrate_agents.description: If true, existing agents attached to this template will be migrated to the new template version

message.description: A message to describe the changes made in this template version

name.description: The exact name of the template

latest_version.description: The latest version of the template

template_deployment_slug.description: The full name of the template, including version and project slug

updated_at.description: When the template was last updated

delete.description: Deletes all versions of a template with the specified name

get.description: Get a snapshot of the template version, this will return the template state at a specific version

parameters.name: template_version
parameters.description: The template version, formatted as {template-name}:{version-number} or {template-name}:latest

put.description: Updates the current working version of a template from a snapshot

parameters.name: template_version
parameters.description: The template name with :current version (e.g., my-template:current)

schema.description: The template snapshot to set as the current version

post.description: Forks a template version into a new template

parameters.name: template_version
parameters.description: The template version, formatted as {template-name}:{version-number} or {template-name}:latest

name.description: Optional custom name for the forked template. If not provided, a random name will be generated.
The exact name of the template

latest_version.description: The latest version of the template

template_deployment_slug.description: The full name of the template, including version and project slug

updated_at.description: When the template was last updated

post.description: Creates a new template from an existing agent or agent file

agent_id.description: The ID of the agent to use as a template, can be from any project

name.description: Optional custom name for the template. If not provided, a random name will be generated.

oneOf.description: Create a template from an existing agent

agent_file.description: The agent file to use as a template, this should be a JSON file exported from the platform

name.description: Optional custom name for the template. If not provided, a random name will be generated.

update_existing_tools.description: If true, update existing custom tools source_code and json_schema (source_type cannot be changed)

oneOf.description: Create a template from an uploaded agent file

schema.description: The type of template to create, currently only agent templates are supported

name.description: The exact name of the template

latest_version.description: The latest version of the template

template_deployment_slug.description: The full name of the template, including version and project slug

updated_at.description: When the template was last updated

patch.description: Renames all versions of a template with the specified name. Versions are automatically stripped from the current template name if accidentally included.

parameters.name: template_name
parameters.description: The current template name (version will be automatically stripped if included)

new_name.description: The new name for the template

patch.description: Updates the description for all versions of a template with the specified name. Versions are automatically stripped from the current template name if accidentally included.

parameters.name: template_name
parameters.description: The template name (version will be automatically stripped if included)

description.description: The new description for the template

get.description: List all versions of a specific template

is_latest.description: Whether this is the latest version

post.description: Migrates a deployment to a specific template version

version.description: The target template version to migrate to

preserve_tool_variables.description: Whether to preserve existing tool variables during migration

preserve_core_memories.description: Whether to preserve existing core memories during migration

memory_variables.description: Additional memory variables to apply during migration

put.description: Updates the current working version of a template from an agent file
put.summary: Update current template from agent file (Cloud-only)

agent_file_json.description: The agent file to update the current template version from

update_existing_tools.description: If true, update existing custom tools source_code and json_schema (source_type cannot be changed)

save_existing_changes.description: If true, Letta will automatically save any changes as a version before updating the template

post.description: Create a new client side access token with the specified configuration.

hostname.description: The hostname of the client side application. Please specify the full URL including the protocol (http or https).

expires_at.description: The expiration date of the token. If not provided, the token will expire in 5 minutes

get.description: List all client side access tokens for the current account. This is only available for cloud users.

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: The agent ID to filter tokens by. If provided, only tokens for this agent will be returned.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset for pagination. Defaults to 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of tokens to return per page. Defaults to 10.

delete.description: Delete a client side access token.
